title: Slow Cooker Chicken and Corn Congee
directions: Combine water, corn, chicken broth, jasmine rice, and chicken breast in a slow cooker.
Cook on Low until chicken is very soft and rice is creamy, about 8 hours. Season with salt and white pepper. Drizzle sesame oil over each serving.
ingredients: 1 (15 ounce) can whole kernel corn, drained
salt and ground white pepper to taste
2 tablespoons sesame oil, or to taste
